quest.name: Nuts to You
journal: The Hume lout thinks you might be the right person for a questionable job.
objectives: Speak with Halldor at Temenos Rookery.

dialogue.name: STRONGHUME03597
dialogue.text: Oho! Yer that, um...that... Yer herhim, aren't ye!?

dialogue.name: STRONGHUME03597
dialogue.text: Halldor's been asking after ye. Ye know Halldor, aye? Clan Nutsy's man? If yer keen to hunt the deadliest marks for the biggest bounties, then ye might want to seek him out.

dialogue.name: STRONGHUME03597
dialogue.text: Ye'll find him by the board over in the rookery. Though, uh...if I were ye, I'd steer clear of that whole nasty business. Bad for one's health, it is...

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: C-Could it be? The esteemed warrior herselfhimself!?

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Well met, misssir, well met! You are a very hard womanman to track down, by all accounts, yet here you are, in the flesh. How very blessed I am to make your acquaintance.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: I am Halldor of Clan Nutsy. Perhaps you have heard of us? We have certainly heard of you, I can tell you that! A fighter, through and through.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: I'll come right to it─interested in joining the clan?

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Apologies, apologies. Only a fool would sign up without knowing what we're about─and you're no fool, I can see that.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: The clan is a, how shall I put it...an association of adventurous souls who make a living hunting certain notable fiends. Marks, as we are wont to call them. Surely you're familiar with the concept?

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Norvrandt is home to myriad living creatures, many of which pose a threat to her good people. Thus did the Exarch─at least I think it was him?─in his boundless wisdom, call upon the Settlement council to develop a framework that would “encourage” motivated hunters to dispatch these menaces.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: To wit, ye brave souls who slay marks shall receive due compensation. Not at all a bad arrangement, eh?

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: If you've a mind to reap the benefits, speak with Xylle over there. She'll record your name in the ledger and see you registered as a clan member.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: May I help you, misssir?

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: ...At the urging of Halldor, was it? I see.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: You are plainly more than capable of acquitting yourself well enough in battle, and so I have no grounds to refuse you. I hereby accept your application to join Clan Nutsy.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Check the board for the latest bills. The tougher the mark, the better the reward. Hunt what you like or nothing at all.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: However, you may only undertake hunts designated appropriate for a member of your current status─a novice. The clan is disinclined to allow unproven hunters to commit suicide by mark.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Once you have achieved a sufficient measure of success, you will be permitted to pursue more dangerous fiends. Do try not to die before then.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: As a new member of Clan Nutsy, you are permitted to take bills for one-nut Clan marks from the Clan Hunt board.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Defeat the monsters described on the bills and you will be rewarded with tokens which can be exchanged for exclusive items.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To exchange tokens for exclusive items, speak with either Xylle in the Crystarium, or with Ilfroy in Eulmore.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New quests and two-nut Clan mark bills will become available from Halldor in the Crystarium upon reaching level 73.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Go and talk to Xylle to sign up! Don't let her charming demeanor fool you─she's a lovely person. If she likes you.
